getAll_GivenValidDbData_ReturnsValidMode.summary: Given valid db data test that if GetAll can return valid models.

getAll_GivenEmptyDbData_ReturnsEmptyMode.summary: Given empty db data test that if GetAll can return empty models.

getById_GivenValidDbData_ReturnsValidMod.summary: Given valid db data test that if GetById can return valid model.

getById_GivenEmptyDbData_ReturnsNull.summary: Given empty db data test that if GetById can return null.

add_CanInsertInDb.summary: Test that add is working properly.

update_CanUpdateInDb.summary: Test that update is working properly.

delete_CanDeleteInDb.summary: Test that delete is working properly.
